LanguageData.MF_UnbuildableOnUpperLevels: Can't be built on upper levels.
LanguageData.MF_OnlyBuildableOnUpperLevels: Can only be built on upper levels.
LanguageData.MF_MustBeBuiltOnTopOfRoof: Must be built on top of roof.
LanguageData.MF_RoomTooSmall: Room size is too small. Must be at least {0} cells.
LanguageData.MF_MustBeBuiltIndoor: Must be built indoor and under the roof.
LanguageData.MF_CantBuildDownStairAboveGround: Can't build downstairs on upper levels.
LanguageData.MF_CantBuildDownStairInCurrentBiome: Can't build downstairs in current biome.
